mapper.select: select mid1.EN_NAME as label,mid1.CELL_NAME as name, mid2.bsc as engname,mid2.vendor as manufacturers from ( select distinct(d.EN_NAME),d.CELL_NAME,t.id from RNO_GSM_CELL d left JOIN RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA t on t.BSC = d.BSC where t.area_id = #{param1} ) mid1 left join (select id,bsc,vendor from RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA where status='N') mid2 on mid1.id=mid2.id order by mid2.bsc,mid1.EN_NAME
